Control Name: 3.11.1 You have steps to troubleshoot database issues.
Control Statement: Applications that spend a lot of execution time in the database layers can benefit from a database tuning analysis. This analysis will only focus on the data tier components and may require special resources such as DBA's to tune queries, indexes, execution plans, and more.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.11 What common problems do you have steps to troubleshoot in your operations playbook?
control_attributes.Control: 3.11.1 You have steps to troubleshoot database issues.
control_attributes.Description: Applications that spend a lot of execution time in the database layers can benefit from a database tuning analysis. This analysis will only focus on the data tier components and may require special resources such as DBA's to tune queries, indexes, execution plans, and more.
